title: Contact News24's public editor with reader complaints
text:
Seasoned journalist and academic Professor George Claassen is the public editor of News24.

Claassen is currently the ombudsman of Media24's community newspapers and has served as a board member of the International Organisation of News Ombudsmen and Readers' Editors since 2011.

Any complaints, queries or suggestions about content on News24 may be sent to george.claassen@media24.com. Alternatively, phone 021 851 3232.



Specific examples are preferable.

KEEP UPDATED on the latest news by subscribing to our FREE newsletter.



- FOLLOW News24 on Twitter
description: Any complaints, queries or suggestions about content on News24 may be sent to our public editor George Claassen.
